GitMem v1.0.0 launch sprint active (Feb 10-14): OD-604→OD-605/606→OD-608→OD-607→OD-609. North star doc: docs/planning/gitmem-v1-launch-sprint-feb-2026.md

Bug: session_close rejects standard close after force:true session creation — duration check uses new session's clock (9 min) instead of actual conversation duration. Activity metrics (recalls, observations) also reset, making meaningful sessions appear trivial. Need to either carry forward activity from prior session or allow standard close override.
